html:
10.4.17  7:56 pm   My grandparent's dog died while I was watching "The entire history of the world, I guess" for the first time.

     imagine how many dogs died during the 11 months i was making it

10.4.17  7:43 pm   10.4.17  1:53 am Can we date? 

     sure

10.4.17  6:54 pm   Do you have similar qualms about Patreon-exclusive content as you do with advertisements?

     no

10.4.17  5:52 pm   what is the fuck

     everything around you

10.4.17  5:09 pm   do you think that miles davis lied about what he accomplished more than someone should?

     it seems like he did ok

10.4.17  4:58 pm   Do you think your next video will be more like a music video such as the last two? Or another one like the Steve video? 

     it's a non-song

10.4.17  4:27 pm   I write things down on notepad and screenshot them so I can post them on instagram. I like doing this because it's one of those pieces of software that everyone is familiar with (for the most part) and it is pretty simple but I can write things that are really meaningful.

     oh that's what i'm talking about

10.4.17  4:10 pm   did you know that some koreans are really worried about japan growing their military?

     that's understandable, it has happened before

10.4.17  3:45 pm   what's your favourite part/scene from history of the entire world i guess

     the part where i pressed upload on may 10, 2017, and then got in the shower and forgot about the past entire 11 months of my life

10.4.17  2:39 pm   How do you deal with criticism?

     maybe criticize the person back

10.4.17  2:30 pm   Is your reflection on a mirror copying you or are you copying your reflection?

     the reflection copies you

10.4.17  2:29 pm   Do you plan on moving to another career anytime?

     no but there are various expansions to my current career which may take place

10.4.17  2:26 pm   When you write songs is it writing all the time or is there a lot of scratching your head trying to come up with the next part?

     a large part of it is being stumped, asking a lot of questions, trying to rule things out, and doing lots of run-throughs, and listening carefully for the lightning to strike once you reach the known end

10.4.17  1:35 pm   Which song are you the proudest of making?

     hopefully the next one

10.4.17  12:04 pm   what style of music would you say yours falls into?

     you will have to listen to it and see

10.4.17  11:16 am   how does it feel like to be in love

     i'm not sure, i don't remember

10.4.17  9:49 am   3.22.17  12:36 pm Is it the "sunrise land" part?

     yes

10.4.17  9:42 am   Do you ever feel like there'll never be enough time to do everything you want to?

     sort of, but there is still time to do a lot

10.4.17  8:58 am   Correct me if I'm wrong, but the chords to the first part of movie star are just B, C#min, and F#

     close but it's really only 2 chords. and the second one is sort of a combination of some of the chords you mentioned

10.4.17  6:53 am   how do different types of power enable "the capacity to organize and control."

     it depends which typification system you are using

10.4.17  6:31 am   10.3.17  2:51 pm
(Not the poster btw)
You've started dating,

     that's not true. i've tried but it does not seem to work

     so I think you've probably upset some of your fangirls. You should notify your new gal

     there isn't one

     that she should probably keep her identity private for now,

     she does not exist

     until the fangirls cool it. 

     what fangirls

10.4.17  6:14 am   last night your song "i wanna be a movie star" was broadcasted at my nearest nightclub.

     i'm not sure i believe you

      you've changed, you're too mainstream now

     i think you will change your mind when you see my next video

10.4.17  3:42 am   i got an idea for you, why don't you make a mixing contest ?
so you make available for download a multitrack session of one of your songs (an old one or a new one) and people can download it and mix it. Then you listen to the submissions, the mix you like the most and that person can become your official mixer !
boom, you just got your first collaborator ! i'm sure there's plenty of talented people that would be thrilled to do that for you (myself included) !

     i can't do that, but i do have some questions if you want to get in touch

10.4.17  3:35 am   Did you purposefully make the thumbnail for Outside the opposite of the thumbnail for I Wanna Be A Movie Star

     i purposely made them both what they are. i will let you decide if they are opposites

10.4.17  3:28 am   Did you make your phone's ringtone

     i don't think anyone has ever called me

10.4.17  3:22 am   Do you think its a waste of your lifetime trying to accomplish 100 lifetimes worth of work during your lifetime?  

     no

10.4.17  2:38 am   Do you have any competitors

     i don't think so

10.4.17  2:22 am   Do you have your popularity planned out? Do you intend to start branching out your brand?

     my current plan is to strengthen some of the branches that already exist, but need strengthening. which may or may not appear to be new branches, depending on how closely you've been paying attention

10.4.17  1:53 am   Why is it so nice to be in love? 

     i don't know but it never seems to work out for me

10.4.17  1:09 am   what is a joke

     i'm not sure

10.4.17  1:08 am   Please don't forget about the improv page. Or the other pages on this site for that matter.

     i am reminded every day of the physical impossibility of updating them all on a regular basis, despite my most desperate desire to do so

     But keep doing what you want to do.

     i want to update every page every day, but unfortunately that's physically impossible

      Just remember those pages are there for a reason and that you can do whatever you want with them.

     that's not necessarily true. what i would want is to keep them all updated simultaneously, on a daily basis, but unfortunately that is physically impossible

     OK thanks sorry thank you very much

10.4.17  1:00 am   what is your most embarrassing moment? 

     right now

10.4.17  12:59 am   Do you celebrate Halloween?

     no

10.4.17  12:45 am   I am very confused. Should I make other people confused to so that I may relate to them and they can relate to me?

     that seems like a reasonable idea

10.4.17  12:34 am   Are you considering making THOTEWIG the new style of your channel?

     no

     If not, then was it a test to see if viewers would like that kind of content?

     that took 11 months. not a test

10.4.17  12:00 am   You always talk about how making history of the entire world was a gruelling process but do you think it was worth it in the end

     oh hell yeah

10.3.17  10:48 pm   I feel as humans we often try to find purpose in everything around us, and when we don't see any logic or rational reasoning behind something it makes us uncomfortable or even frightened. With that said, is there any purpose behind your work, Bill?

     yes

      Or perhaps you intend to relay the idea that not everything has to make sense.



but actually tho wtf

10.3.17  10:30 pm   can you tell me a joke?

     our research shows that the number 1 request our customers have is to see more relevant ads

10.3.17  10:13 pm   Do you sometimes feel depresed?

     no

10.3.17  9:53 pm   How do you know when a video is done

     you just have to guess

10.3.17  8:17 pm   Do you think it's important for a song to have a hook? Not necessarily a chorus, but like a little figure or "motif" that sticks out. Like that Bb-C-C riff (Bah dum dum!) from Hit Me Baby One More Time? Or all those guitar parts that open up Beatles songs (Something, In My Life, I Want To Hold Your Hand, Sgt Peppers, etc)? Or that repeating vocal line that opens Uptown Funk? Is it most effective to start the song with the hook?

     you will have to try it different ways and see what happens

10.3.17  8:16 pm   would you like to try a lollipop?

     not right now

     i think you're missing out.

10.3.17  8:06 pm   Can I join you the next time you are doing an 8 hour walk

     oh hell yeah

10.3.17  8:01 pm   Any progress with the content ID issue?

     oh hell yeah. next task is to hope the memesters don't hate me

10.3.17  7:53 pm   What was the inspiration for the first verse in "Guess I've Got to Listen to Bob Marley"

     the first verse has no inspiration, and i don't like it. the second verse is the one with all the inspiration, and it was written first. then i had to think of a first verse. not my best work. it means nothing and is not good. a real drag. but it functions i guess. it's like the store brand verse

10.3.17  7:45 pm   give me a common phrase. I will think about donating to you depending on the quality of answer I get.

     aesthetic goals af

10.3.17  7:41 pm   if you spend all day working on your projects and whatnot then how are you able to come up with all the clever and deep ideas that you often express on this page?

     before that i had a lot of ideas. too many ideas, and that's part of the reason there is now so much to work on

10.3.17  7:38 pm   do you know any hip places young people are hanging out lately? like, young people who would be interested in artistic things?

     right where you are, there is at least one

10.3.17  7:33 pm   How long did hotewig take to upload?

     maybe about an hour. and probably an additional hour as it gets converted to higher formats, because the video uploads and is playable first at 360 and then you have to wait a while for the higher formats to kick in, during which time the video was on private

10.3.17  7:12 pm   Hey can you please t shirts 

     i made a bunch of designs, but i got the samples from the company and they really sucked. the colors were really dim. so i have the designs but no company. i really really did not want to do merch in the first place but somehow i made the designs anyway and i was gonna make more
